body_html: Indeed, the graph where I had the bug #464 was also using this mix of embedding layer and reshape. So I might have misinterpreted, and there is actually two bugs: one with "tf.reshape" and Momentum and Adagrad, and the other with "tf.nce_loss" and RMSProp... I will try to check further...

body: Indeed, the graph where I had the bug #464 was also using this mix of embedding layer and reshape. So I might have misinterpreted, and there is actually two bugs: one with "tf.reshape" and Momentum and Adagrad, and the other with "tf.nce_loss" and RMSProp... I will try to check further...
